mapper.sql: SELECT HOUSE_INFO, COUNT(*) AS FAMILY_NUM FROM MEMBER WHERE AUTHOR <> 'ADMIN' GROUP BY HOUSE_INFO
SELECT HOUSE_INFO, ID, NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE AUTHOR = 'OWNER'
mapper.select:
WITH A AS (), B AS ()
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN , A.HOUSE_INFO , A.FAMILY_NUM , B.ID , B.NAME FROM A JOIN B ON A.HOUSE_INFO = B.HOUSE_INFO ORDER BY HOUSE_INFO WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) WHERE RN > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
